name: pictionary-game
description: A multiplayer pictionary game with web, mobile, and server components

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter shared-types build" "pnpm --filter server dev" "pnpm --filter web dev" "pnpm --filter mobile start"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter shared-types build && pnpm --filter server build && pnpm --filter web build && pnpm --filter mobile build
scripts.start: concurrently "pnpm --filter server start" "pnpm --filter web preview" "pnpm --filter mobile start"
